messages.subject: Shinsengumi TV
messages.msgSnippet: Ok, so I m in one of my not-so-sane moods and I was thinking about what TV shows different Shinsengumi members were best suited for. Here s what I ve come up
messages.messageBody:
Ok, so I'm in one of my not-so-sane moods and I was thinking about
what TV shows different Shinsengumi members were best suited for.
Here's what I've come up with so far:

Law & Order: Hijikata, Saito, and Okita
Fear Factor: Hijikata and Saito
Elimidate: Hijikata
The Weakest Link: Yamanami
Keeping Up Appearances: Ito
Married with Children: Saito
Jeopardy: Serizawa
Dr. Phil: Miki
Friends: Hijikata, Kondo, Okita, and Inoue
Just Shoot Me: Kondo
General Hospital: Okita

Ok, you can lynch me now...

-MissBehavin
